article:
Three ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name 'HMSContent':

* was a 70-gun third rate captured from the French in 1695 and hulked in 1703.
* was a storeship purchased in 1708 and sold in 1715.
* was a 12-gun gunvessel launched in 1797 and wrecked in 1799 (although there is
  some doubt about this vessel, which may have been a hired brig).
